name: Shooty Space Rocks
description:
Shooty Space Rocks Inspiration:

Shooty Space Rocks is inspired by the classic arcade game Asteroids. When my daughter tried it out and loved it, I decided to changed the style to fit her esthetic.

How to play:

Shoot the rocks to get points! You lose points if the rocks reach bottom.

Large rocks break into small rocks when hit.

Gather stars and use them in the shop for upgrades.

Controls:
  • Shoot - Spacebar
  • move -  up/down/left/right (or WASD)
  • Use powerup - press V
  • Open the store - press B
Points Values:
  • Small Rocks = 5 points 
  • Large Rocks = 10 points
